name: Hover Courier
description:
Made for the Indie Game Dev Beginners Jam #3 using Unity. This is not only my first jam but also my first release in general.

In "Hover Courier," you take on the role of a hoverbot navigating the bustling city streets to pick up and deliver packages as fast as possible. Your objective is to complete each delivery efficiently while dodging traffic and avoiding obstacles. But be careful – with a limited number of lives, every collision counts!

Controls:
Move - W A S D
Jump - Space
Pick up / Deliver Packages - E

Used Assets:
- Bézier Path Creator 
- 3D Models: "Polygon City" & "Polygon Kids" by Synty Studios

Music by: https://www.steven-obrien.net/
--------------------------
Doot Doot - Steven O'Brien
Carefree - Steven O'Brien
